channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM)

item.title: CVE-2021-26564|2024-09-17T00:46:03.051Z -- synology -- synology%20diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Cleartext transmission of sensitive information vulnerability in synorelayd in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.2.3-25426-3 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof servers via an HTTP session.
